property.name: yarn.timeline-service.generic-application-history.store-class
property.description: Store class name for history store, defaulting to file system store

property.name: yarn.timeline-service.generic-application-history.fs-history-store.uri
property.description: URI pointing to the location of the FileSystem path where the history will be persisted. This must be supplied when using org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.applicationhistoryservice.FileSystemApplicationHistoryStore as the value for yarn.timeline-service.generic-application-history.store-class

property.name: yarn.timeline-service.generic-application-history.fs-history-store.compression-type
property.description: T-file compression types used to compress history data.

property.name: yarn.timeline-service.generic-application-history.enabled
property.description: Indicate to ResourceManager as well as clients whether history-service is enabled or not. If enabled, ResourceManager starts recording historical data that ApplicationHistory service can consume. Similarly, clients can redirect to the history service when applications finish if this is enabled.

property.name: yarn.timeline-service.enabled
property.description: Indicate to clients whether timeline service is enabled or not. If enabled, clients will put entities and events to the timeline server.
